title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-8.1 - Certification requirements for New York City assessors, generally
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-8.1 - Certification requirements for New York City assessors, generally

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart
applies to all individuals who perform professional appraisal duties relating
to the assessment or adjudication of property for the real property tax. On or
before April 1st each year ORPTS will provide the Department of Citywide

Administrative Services with a list of those agencies of the city government
and the job titles within those agencies that are subject to the provisions of
this Subpart. Additions to or deletions from that list may be made at any
time. (b) Each assessor serving on
the effective date of this Subpart must attain certification by April 1, 2009. (c) A State certified
assessor must be recertified upon a reappointment where there has been an
interruption of continuous service of at least four years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8188-8.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
